resources.string: The captain was shouting out orders over the crashing sounds of the lightning and the waves tearing our ship a part. It was no use. In an instance we were all fighting for our lives in the roiling waters; everything went dark. I woke up to clear, sunny skies all alone. The island that I\'d washed up on had a huge
air felt felt amazing on my skin. I decided the first thing I needed to do if I wanted to get off this island was find a
to the bits of wreckage that had washed ashore. I dared not hope for a companion, but I couldn\'t help but look to see if
had survived the wreck. No luck. I started out toward the center of the island to try and find some drinkable water. I felt an
thirst that made me want to
